title: What is the meaning of the video of Justin Timberlake's Mirror?

og.title: What is the meaning of the video of Justin Timberlake's Mirror?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 4): The video opens with a dedication to "William and Sadie," JT's grandparents. The two were reportedly married for 63 years, up until William's death last year. Conveniently, the music video appears to tell the story of an old widow.

After the dedication, we watch the relationship...
